ComicInfo.Title: Big-Time Blues featuring Bonko Beans: A True Tale of the Big City; Meanwhile...; Cause and Effect Comics; The Multi-Media Kid; Krude Kut-Ups; True Shit; Faroutman Conquers the Universe; "OK, Get in, We Want to Talk to You"; Freedom; Chapter One; Whip Tip Tales; Dropout Boogie; The Six O'Clock Report; Machine
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bonko treks to the big city and signs up with P.T. Conner's Funny Stuff company, only to get ripped off by him and then sold to a carnival.
A tiny little automobile growing in size.
Faroutman is attacked by 50,000 Volkswagons among other psychedelic menaces.
The taking of a psychedelic substance.
Sitting down watching television against one's better judgement.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 09:11:28. [CVDB185369] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:12:02. [Issue ID 277626]
